snippet: Fresh from winning his ninth Monte Carlo Masters title, Rafael Nadal will face Marcel Granollers or Daniel Muñoz de la Nava in his opening match....
lead_paragraph: Fresh from winning his ninth Monte Carlo Masters title, Rafael Nadal will face Marcel Granollers or Daniel Muñoz de la Nava in his opening match.
abstract: Rafael Nadal receives bye in first round of Barcelona Open, which he hopes to win for ninth time; other tennis news noted.
